oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - Musical content for 1948-03-06 broadcast
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: All Star Western Theatre radio program musical content (no radio play), which appears in the March 6, 1948 broadcast (see TR000757 and TR000758 ). It is evident that the musical content and radio play were recorded on separate discs, and later dubbed to further discs as a complete show with commercials added.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Happy Rovin' Cowboy (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- Have I Told You Lately That I Love You? (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Drifting Along, Singing A Song (instrumental) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Oregon (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Drifting Along, Singing A Song (instrumental) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Song Of The Sierras (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Closing statement (Foy Willing) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Terry O'Sullivan)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: All star western theatre (Radio program); Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Farnworth, Scott; Smith, John T. (Actor); Tedrow, Irene; McVey, Tyler
